channel.title: Xgboot on My First Website
channel.description: Recent content in Xgboot on My First Website

item.title: Customer Loss--Xgboost
item.description: 算法应用–携程客户流失预测 数据说明 数据集为携程云海数据比赛题目云海赛事,共51个特征(其中一个为label[0,1分类]),缺失较严重. 数据概述 library(tidyverse) library(woeBinning) library(rsample) library(ggthemes) # set theme old <- theme_set(theme_fivethirtyeight() + theme(text = element_text(family = "Menlo"))) # 设置种子 set.seed(1111) dat <- read_tsv("~/Documents/GitHub/customer_loss/data/yhxwfx_data/userlostprob_train.csv", na = c("NULL")) dat %>% skimr::skim() ## Skim summary statistics ## n obs: 689945 ## n variables: 51 ## ## Variable type: Date ## variable missing complete n min max median ## arrival 0 689945 689945 2016-05-15 2016-06-20 2016-05-20 ## d 0 689945 689945 2016-05-15 2016-05-21 2016-05-18 ## n_unique ## 37 ## 7 ## ## Variable type: integer ## variable missing complete n mean ## cancelrate 11718 678227 689945 1051.
